participant_2.background:
I love listening to rap music with my dog.
skateboarding is a hobby of mine.
I'm a brunette who loves to organize and stand out in a crowd with my leather clothes.
I live in a small home and love my collection of comic books.
i want to be alone sometimes.

content.text: Hello, what are you hobbies?
I love skateboarding and listening to rap music with my dog.
That's cool, I like to skateboard too. I broke my nose when I was 10 while skateboarding.
Oh no! That must have hurt. I try to be careful while skateboarding.
I'm not usually careful, but I'm glad I was wearing a helmet.
That's smart. I always wear a helmet when I skateboard.
What kind of rap music do you like?
I like all kinds of rap music, but I mostly listen to old school hip hop.
I like old school hip hop too. I like listening to the Beastie Boys and Run DMC.
Those are great bands! I also like listening to Public Enemy and NWA.
Those are also great bands. I like how they're all so different from each other, but they're all great.
I agree. I like how they all have their own unique sound.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to organize my collection of comic books.
That's cool. I don't collect comic books, but I like to read them.
I love reading comic books too. I have a big collection of them.
What's your favorite comic book?
My favorite comic book is The Dark Knight Returns.
That's a great comic book. I like the story and the artwork.
Me too. It's a classic comic book.
Do you want to talk about comic books more?
Sure, I love talking about comic books.
